TopicTitle: Is the 'insert' key a fixed funtion key?

Articles.Content:
I use my Insert key to take screen-shots through the Steam client. Since 1,2 released I haven't been able to do this when I'm in Orbital Map View as it resets me back to standard map view and misses the screen-shot.

After looking through all the key settings there is no mention of the Insert key being assigned to any use at all.

I tried to assign the key and then clear it to see if that would fix the issue but it didn't.

This indicates that the Insert key has been hard coded to this one action.

Have a look in your settings.cfg file. Not all key bindings that are configurable through editing that file manually are exposed in the UI.

In my settings.cfg (on linux, these things vary by platform), Insert is mapped to UIMODE_STAGING. I have no idea why that would change map mode, and it doesn't for me, but maybe it's set to something else for you?
